column5: A hot day on the water Will make the largies feed...  And this one was HUNGRY!    She had a large face and no girth.    But what do you expect.... She had a great spawn!    And will have a nice future spawn also.....  Go......... and produce more of your type.....LARGE FACE!
Got to love them largies   vance
nice colours !!! i mean the bass   good one there fishing 24/7

Great report and pics Kev That large face looks like she was on a strict diet for a while Ever tried white tubes or Mepps for them buckets???  Reason I ask is that yesterday, Paul and I caught bass on tubes and spinners.... they weren't too shy about it Thanks for sharing Jacques
you guys fished for trout yesterday?
Yep..... without a sniff     Did you know there was bass in that lake???  Smallies and largies and pike....
